content.rendered:
With decades of experience across capital markets, Tokeny’s team brings together in-depth knowledge from traditional finance whilst also coupling this with blockchain expertise. Founded in 2017, the team currently encompasses over 23 professionals with a global reach spanning from Luxembourg, Barcelona, Paris, Turkey, Greece, and Brazil.

excerpt.rendered: Shurong joined the team back in April 2018 as an intern and became Marketing & Communication Manager after the internship.  Who are you? My name is Shurong Li. I'm from a small city, Kaiyuan (Yunnan), located in the southwest of China. After I graduated from university, I worked as a software engineer for over a...
